title: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: "Dirty Page" behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved (including the quotes). The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled "Error" (including the quotes).
OB: When editing the XML in the "source" view of the Layout Editor and trying to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating the need to save the changes.
EB: The XML Report Design has been changed. The error dialog title should be improved (without the quotes) and provide clearer instructions.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open the XML Report Designer editor.
2. Edit the XML in the "source" view.
3. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view.
4. Observe the error message stating that the source page is dirty.
